code: import React from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import ScoreBar from'../../utils/visuals/ScoreBar';import'../nonGlobalStyle/ChildrenList.css';import'../../CodeCSS/App.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ChildrenList=_ref=>{let{children:childrenNodes}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"children-list-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"children-list-header",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Children Nodes"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"children-list-items",children:childrenNodes.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"empty-children",children:"No child nodes"}):childrenNodes.map(child=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"root-card",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:"/node/".concat(child.id),className:"children-list-link",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"children-list-title",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:child.statementTrueFalseFlag?'true-color':'false-color',children:child.title||"Node ".concat(child.id)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"children-list-status",children:child.statementTrueFalseFlag?'True':'False'})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"children-list-score",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ScoreBar,{score:child.score,height:10,showValueInside:true,color:"#4285F4",label:"Weighted Average Score",isCompleted:child.allChildrenCompleted})})]})},child.id))})]});};export default ChildrenList;
